mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT BO.BOARD_NUM , BOARD_TITLE , BO.USER_ID , TO_CHAR(BOARD_REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24') AS BOARD_REG_DATE , (SELECT COUNT(REPLY_NUM) FROM BOARD_REPLY WHERE BOARD_NUM = BO.BOARD_NUM ) AS REPLY_COUNT , BOARD_READ_CNT FROM BOARD BO LEFT JOIN BOARD_REPLY RE ON BO.BOARD_NUM = RE.BOARD_NUM ORDER BY BO.BOARD_NUM DESC

SELECT BOARD_NUM , BOARD_TITLE , BOARD_CONTENT , USER_ID , BOARD_READ_CNT
, TO_CHAR(BOARD_REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS BOARD_REG_DATE FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_NUM = #{boardNum}
